post.body: good luck with your linkedin seminar today in Chicago - should be amazing!
Back at work after the holidays. Using Joomla to launch 14 new web sites.
Found my mojo to work on my blog again. More an expat business blog, less Gurgaon - http://american-in-delhi.blogspot.com/
Just starting the night shift in Delhi so I can work with the Costa Rica team.
Still wondering why twitter can't get with the program and coordinate within facebook, plurk & ping.
I'm using ping.fm, plurk and facebook instead of twitter these days. Just find them more convenient these days. Any way 2 integrate these?
dodging cows on the highway looking for the foreigner registration office in Delhi.
is reconnecting with some old peeps.
Got our new flat in Gurgaon. We should be getting our car and driver today - YAY!!!
Closing on a flat in Gurgaon today. Hopefully we'll be moving to the new place later this eve...
scheduling vet appointment so my dog and cat can go to Delhi with us.
Said goodbye to Trudi today, who's moving to Scotland to study. We'll miss her.
Making plans to move to Delhi. I hear they have kitty litter there...
trying to figure out how to move to Delhi...
It's been over 100 degrees in Calcutta for the past week and they say May is even warmer...that's it - I'm moving to Iceland... 8-(

recuperating from my trip around the world.
